Title: The Holiday
Overview: Two women, one from the United States and one from the United Kingdom, swap homes at Christmas time after bad breakups with their boyfriends. Each woman finds romance with a local man but realizes that the imminent return home may end the relationship.
Tagline: It's Christmas Eve and we are going to go celebrate being young and being alive.
Keywords: holiday, london england, film making, christmas party, country house, room exchange, surrey, romantic comedy, los angeles, multiple storylines, woman director, christmas
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Universal Pictures, Waverly Films, Relativity Media
Cast: Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jude Law
